about_the_game:
In short:

  • A minimalistic but challenging blend of RTS, Tower Defence, and Survivors-like
  • No nonsense action-packed high-tension gameplay
  • Rebuild a kingdom city-by-city in a company with hand crafted levels and 4+ hours of gameplay
  • Quick levels of up to 45 minutes
  • Simple meta progression
  • Slay hordes of monsters
  • Rebuild your city and defend it with your hero, troops and towers
  • Become stronger and upgrade your hero to unlock new overpowered abilities
  • Heroic difficulty with larger and stronger hordes for those brave enough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 2.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A minimalistic blend of RTS, Tower Defence, and Survivors-like. Build your city and take command of your troops in a battle against ruthless monster hordes. Upgrade your hero and stand shoulder-to-shoulder with your army in this grimdark fantasy world!
